message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $8000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between my original offer and your offer. I'll sell it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, and I think it's a fair price for the product.

Bob, I understand you're serious about the product, and I appreciate your willingness to make a fair offer. However, I'm not quite ready to go as low as $7500. I'll meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'll sell it to you for $8250.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm getting close to my budget limit. I'd be willing to pay $7000 for it. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
